column3: Department of Civil, Environmental & Geomatic Engineering
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Geospatial Sciences (Hydrographic Surveying) MSc provides students with the theory, tools and techniques for working with geospatial data in the marine environment, from acquisition to processing and analysis. Students have the opportunity to engage and work with academics and industrial partners on cutting-edge research through seminars and a dissertation.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
